welcome.title: Find Missing Files
welcome.description: Select a folder containing sequentially named files to discover any gaps in the numbering.

emptyState.noResultsDescription: No files match your search "{{query}}". Try adjusting your search terms.
emptyState.noMissingDescription: Great news! All files in the sequence are present. No gaps were detected.
emptyState.noAvailableDescription: No files found in the selected directory. Try selecting a different folder.
emptyState.noFilesDescription: No files found in the selected directory. Try selecting a different folder.
